mapper.select: SELECT e.EXPERT_NUMBER, e.MEMBER_NUMBER, e.EXPERT_LICENSE_INFO, e.EXPERT_CAREER, e.EXPERT_FIELD_NUMBER, a.EXPERT_STATUS_NUMBER as EXPERT_CERT_STATUS_NUMBER, a.EXPERT_APPLICANT_REASON, a.EXPERT_CHECK_DATE FROM tbl_expert_applicant a LEFT JOIN TBL_EXPERT e ON a.MEMBER_NUMBER = e.MEMBER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN tbl_file_expert fe ON fe.MEMBER_NUMBER = a.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE a.MEMBER_NUMBER = ${memberNumber}
